attributes.background: The government needs to issue a nationwide recall of all faulty tumble dryers. Being put on a one year waiting list to have a tumble dryer assessed and fixed or replaced is not acceptable. Thousands of faulty tumble dryers are in people's homes and people's houses are catching on fire!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is the responsibility of individual companies to instigate a national recall of faulty products.
